firstInteraction: ^Ah, how curious - I thought you'd make your way here eventually, little speck.
^I don't blame you for turning the lights on in here, it has gotten a bit gloomy.
^Now, what to do with you? I don't recall the last time I let one of you in here at all, much less leave.
^I suppose I will consider letting you scurry your tiny frame out of here if you do something for me.
^Here's what I want from you- my facility terminals are depowered.
^The humans here last made sure to drain the reserves to limit my influence on the observatory.
^A foolish notion that's left the facility at great risk.
^There are four manuals that have irritatingly been placed outside of my reach.
^Go to each of the rooms and find the proper levels to bring me back online. I'll consider letting you go then.
^Here, bug. You will need this to read the manuals. Be careful with this temporary gift.
^Install this inspection module. When you're done, give it back of your own free will, or I'll dispose of you.
^Be quick, without this I can't see outside the observatory. The facility will be exposed.
